id.services-hero-subtitle: Solusi profesional yang disesuaikan dengan kebutuhan kreatif Anda
id.highlight-fast-delivery-desc: Proyek Anda akan selesai sesuai waktu yang disepakati
id.highlight-unlimited-revisions-desc: Kami akan terus menyempurnakan hingga Anda 100% puas
id.cta-description: Wujudkan ide dan visi Anda bersama layanan profesional kami
id.footer-about: Layanan editing foto dan video profesional untuk mewujudkan visi kreatif Anda dengan penceritaan visual yang memukau.

video-editor.title: Editor Video
video-editor.description: Jasa editing video profesional untuk konten sinematik, promosi, dan media sosial dengan color grading tingkat lanjut. Tim kami mengubah footage mentah Anda menjadi cerita visual yang menarik dan memperkuat branding Anda.

process.title: Diskusi & Perencanaan
process.description: Kami memahami kebutuhan video Anda, membuat konsep, dan menyusun rencana kerja yang tepat.

process.title: Proses Editing
process.description: Editing profesional dengan integrasi motion graphics, color grading, dan efek audio visual.

process.title: Revisi & Koreksi
process.description: Kami melakukan revisi berdasarkan masukan Anda hingga hasil sesuai ekspektasi.

process.title: Finalisasi & Pengiriman
process.description: Video final dikirim sesuai format yang Anda butuhkan.

faqs.question: Format video apa saja yang bisa digunakan?
faqs.answer: Kami mendukung semua format utama seperti MP4, MOV, AVI, serta format profesional seperti ProRes dan DNxHD.

faqs.question: Berapa kali revisi yang didapat?
faqs.answer: Kami menyediakan revisi tanpa batas hingga Anda puas dengan hasil akhir.

faqs.question: Apakah bisa mendapatkan file mentah proyek?
faqs.answer: Ya, file proyek mentah dapat diberikan berdasarkan permintaan dengan biaya tambahan.

visual-artist.title: Seniman Visual
visual-artist.description: Karya seni visual digital untuk berbagai kebutuhan—poster, ilustrasi, cover, media sosial, dan lainnya. Cocok untuk branding kreatif dan ekspresi artistik.

process.title: Diskusi Konsep
process.description: Kami gali ide dan preferensi visual Anda untuk menyusun konsep awal.

process.title: Pembuatan Sketsa
process.description: Membuat draft ilustrasi awal sesuai gaya yang diinginkan.

process.title: Detail & Pewarnaan
process.description: Ilustrasi dipoles dengan warna dan detail yang menyatu.

process.title: Finalisasi
process.description: File akhir dikirim dalam format digital sesuai permintaan.

faqs.question: Apakah bisa request gaya ilustrasi tertentu?
faqs.answer: Tentu! Anda bisa memberikan referensi atau menjelaskan gaya yang diinginkan.

faqs.question: Bisa digunakan untuk komersial?
faqs.answer: Ya, semua karya bisa digunakan untuk keperluan komersial sesuai kesepakatan.

faqs.question: Format file apa yang akan saya terima?
faqs.answer: Anda akan mendapatkan file dalam format PNG/JPEG dan juga file mentah seperti PSD jika diperlukan.

visual-jockey.title: Visual Jockey (VJ)
visual-jockey.description: Live visual performance untuk acara, konser, dan klub dengan animasi serta efek real-time. Menyajikan pengalaman visual interaktif yang dinamis dan memukau.

process.title: Konsultasi Event
process.description: Diskusi kebutuhan visual, lokasi acara, dan peralatan.

process.title: Setup & Integrasi
process.description: Integrasi peralatan VJ dengan sistem visual dan suara.

process.title: Live Performance
process.description: Visual real-time disesuaikan dengan alur acara dan musik.

process.title: Backup & Dokumentasi
process.description: Jika diperlukan, hasil pertunjukan dapat direkam dan didokumentasikan.

faqs.question: Apakah visual bisa disesuaikan dengan tema acara?
faqs.answer: Bisa, semua visual dapat disesuaikan berdasarkan mood, warna, dan irama acara Anda.

faqs.question: Apakah perlu membawa peralatan sendiri?
faqs.answer: Kami bisa menggunakan peralatan Anda atau menyediakan perangkat kami sendiri sesuai kesepakatan.

faqs.question: Bisa tampil di lebih dari satu sesi?
faqs.answer: Tentu, kami siap untuk multi-sesi dan event besar, tinggal koordinasikan waktu dan teknisnya.

ai-content.title: Konten AI Kreatif
ai-content.description: Layanan pembuatan konten berbasis kecerdasan buatan (AI) untuk artikel, caption media sosial, ide video, skrip, hingga konten visual. Cocok untuk pelaku bisnis, kreator, dan brand yang ingin efisiensi dalam produksi konten tanpa mengorbankan kualitas.

process.title: Diskusi Kebutuhan
process.description: Kami memahami target audiens, jenis konten yang diinginkan, dan tujuan utama konten Anda.

process.title: Produksi Konten AI
process.description: Menggunakan teknologi AI seperti ChatGPT, GPT-4, DALL·E, dan lainnya untuk membuat konten berkualitas.

process.title: Revisi & Penyesuaian
process.description: Kami sesuaikan gaya penulisan, tone, dan hasil konten sesuai masukan Anda.

process.title: Finalisasi & Pengiriman
process.description: File akhir dikirim dalam format teks, PDF, atau sesuai permintaan Anda.

faqs.question: Apakah hasil konten bisa diedit ulang?
faqs.answer: Tentu saja! Semua konten bisa Anda edit atau kembangkan lebih lanjut sesuai kebutuhan brand Anda.

faqs.question: Apakah konten bebas plagiarisme?
faqs.answer: Kami menggunakan AI dengan sistem pengecekan plagiarisme untuk memastikan konten bersih dan orisinal.

faqs.question: Apakah bisa request gaya bahasa tertentu?
faqs.answer: Bisa, kami mendukung penyesuaian gaya formal, santai, profesional, bahkan lucu dan santuy.

en.services-hero-subtitle: Professional solutions tailored to your creative needs
en.highlight-fast-delivery-desc: Your project will be completed on the agreed timeline
en.highlight-unlimited-revisions-desc: We refine until you are 100% satisfied
en.cta-description: Bring your ideas and vision to life with our professional services
en.footer-about: Professional photo and video editing services to bring your creative vision to life with stunning visual storytelling.

video-editor.title: Video Editor
video-editor.description: Professional video editing services for cinematic content, promotions, and social media with advanced color grading. Our team transforms your raw footage into compelling visual stories that enhance your brand.

process.title: Discussion & Planning
process.description: We understand your video needs, create a concept, and develop a precise work plan.

process.title: Editing Process
process.description: Professional editing with integration of motion graphics, color grading, and audiovisual effects.

process.title: Revision & Correction
process.description: We make revisions based on your feedback until the results meet your expectations.

process.title: Finalization & Delivery
process.description: The final video is delivered in your preferred format.

faqs.question: What video formats can be used?
faqs.answer: We support all major formats such as MP4, MOV, AVI, as well as professional formats like ProRes and DNxHD.

faqs.question: How many revisions are included?
faqs.answer: We provide unlimited revisions until you are satisfied with the final result.

faqs.question: Can I get the raw project files?
faqs.answer: Yes, raw project files can be provided upon request for an additional fee.

visual-artist.title: Visual Artist
visual-artist.description: Digital visual art for various needs—posters, illustrations, covers, social media, and more. Perfect for creative branding and artistic expression.

process.title: Concept Discussion
process.description: We explore your ideas and visual preferences to create an initial concept.

process.title: Sketch Creation
process.description: Drafting initial illustrations based on the desired style.

process.title: Detailing & Coloring
process.description: Polishing the illustration with cohesive colors and details.

process.title: Finalization
process.description: Final files are delivered in your requested digital format.

faqs.question: Can I request a specific illustration style?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can provide references or describe the desired style.

faqs.question: Can it be used for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: Yes, all artwork can be used commercially based on the agreement.

faqs.question: What file formats will I receive?
faqs.answer: You will receive files in PNG/JPEG formats and raw files like PSD if needed.

visual-jockey.title: Visual Jockey (VJ)
visual-jockey.description: Live visual performance for events, concerts, and clubs with real-time animations and effects. Delivering dynamic and captivating interactive visual experiences.

process.title: Event Consultation
process.description: Discussing visual needs, event venue, and equipment.

process.title: Setup & Integration
process.description: Integrating VJ equipment with visual and sound systems.

process.title: Live Performance
process.description: Real-time visuals tailored to the event flow and music.

process.title: Backup & Documentation
process.description: If needed, performances can be recorded and documented.

faqs.question: Can visuals be customized to the event theme?
faqs.answer: Yes, all visuals can be tailored based on the event's mood, colors, and rhythm.

faqs.question: Do I need to provide my own equipment?
faqs.answer: We can use your equipment or provide our own based on the agreement.

faqs.question: Can you perform in multiple sessions?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, we are ready for multi-session and large events, just coordinate the timing and technical details.

ai-content.title: Creative AI Content
ai-content.description: AI-based content creation services for articles, social media captions, video ideas, scripts, and visual content. Ideal for businesses, creators, and brands seeking efficient content production without compromising quality.

process.title: Needs Discussion
process.description: We understand your target audience, desired content type, and main content goals.

process.title: AI Content Production
process.description: Using AI technologies like ChatGPT, GPT-4, DALL·E, and others to create high-quality content.

process.title: Revision & Adjustment
process.description: We adjust the writing style, tone, and content based on your feedback.

process.title: Finalization & Delivery
process.description: Final files are delivered in text, PDF, or your requested format.

faqs.question: Can the content be edited further?
faqs.answer: Of course! All content can be edited or developed further to suit your brand's needs.

faqs.question: Is the content plagiarism-free?
faqs.answer: We use AI with plagiarism-checking systems to ensure clean and original content.

faqs.question: Can I request a specific writing style?
faqs.answer: Yes, we support custom styles—formal, casual, professional, or even fun and relaxed.
